LanguageData.AM_DuelSpot.description: Designates a spot where friendly duels can take place. Two colonists with valid melee weapons may spar here for fun and practice.
LanguageData.AM_DuelSpot.label: duel spot
LanguageData.AM_LassoCloth.description: A cloth lasso that can drag enemies into melee range from a distance, or pull friendlies out of harm's way.
LanguageData.AM_LassoCloth.label: Lasso
LanguageData.AM_LassoDevilstrand.description: A devilstrand lasso that can drag enemies into melee range from a distance, or pull friendlies out of harm's way.\nAllows increased lasso reach compared to a regular lasso.
LanguageData.AM_LassoDevilstrand.label: Devilstrand Lasso
LanguageData.AM_LassoHyperwave.description: A hyperwave lasso that can drag enemies into melee range from a distance, or pull friendlies out of harm's way.\nAllows increased lasso reach compared to a devilstrand lasso.
LanguageData.AM_LassoHyperwave.label: Hyperwave Lasso
LanguageData.AM_Weebstick.description: A legendary weapon of origin unknown. The wielder of this mighty weapon feels compelled to wear a dark trenchcoat and answer questions with a grunt. Some may find this unsettling but none can deny its effectiveness in combat. Unlocks a unique and deadly Special Skill animation.
LanguageData.AM_Weebstick.label: Scarlet Edge
LanguageData.AM_Weebstick.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.AM_Weebstick.tools.1.label: edge
